name: MelonGame
description:
If you like Celeste and consider yourself to be no stranger to insane difficulty, well... this game is just for you!
This is a challenging platformer in the lands of Melondom where only death awaits you. You'll be playing as our one and only hero, first of her name, protector of the melons, the great Melonine, who's on an adventure to find a mythical fruit, The Golden Melon.

What is the Golden Melon?
Why is she after this fruit?
Will she be able to find it?
How many buzzsaws are too much?

Help our hero in her quest and you may find your answers... or may not, you'll most likely rage quit before reaching the end. 🍉

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Guide:
To load the game from a previous checkpoint, open the menu with "ESC" and choose "Reload".
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
A Little Game by Tianuhlan!
Music: OneMooseyBoi
Art: Pixel Frog
